title: 7 countries that don’t have a central bank
description: Liechtenstein does not have its own central bank. It uses the Swiss Franc, managed by the Swiss National Bank. Because it shares currency with Switzerland, it follows Swiss monetary policy and avoids having to run its own bank. Liechtenstein focuses on a strong financial services sector.
